EmailTemplate.name: Routed to Delegate Email
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED: FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Has Been Delegated for Your Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c} has delegated FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} to you for review by{!PubReviewTeam__c.FPRDueDateFF__c}.The justification for this delegation is as follows: {!PubReviewTeam__c.Delegation_Justification__c}. Thank you in advance for your review.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Note: If additional reviewers are needed, triage this assignment BEFORE voting. All new reviewers must be trained on the FPR system. Contact your assigned FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, if you have questions or need support.
Thank you, FPR System
